# scale

**Instance Property**

The amount of opacity specified as a single value.

## Declaration

```swift
var scale: Float
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Opacity/texture] is `nil`, RealityKit uses this value for the opacity of the entire material. If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Opacity/texture] isn’t `nil`, RealityKit multiplies the value sampled from [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Opacity/texture] by this property to calculate the final opacity values.

## Accessing opacity data

- **texture**: The amount of opacity specified using a UV-mapped image.
